sections.MISSION:
Bull Troop conducts Pistol/Shotgun Qualification IVO RNG 108 NLT 05 2359 DEC2024 IOT qualify all soldiers on weapons in preparation for SQDLFX and collective training
Bull Thunder Pistol/Shotgun RNG 108
COMMANDERS
sections.PURPOSE: Prepare Troop for SQD LFX and further collective training
sections.END STATE:
50 Bull Troopers Qualified in M17 and 22 M500, No casualties
TRAINING OBJECTIVES:
Bull Troopers can accurately and quickly engage the enemy using the M500 Shotgun
Bull Troopers can accurately and quickly engage the enemy using the M17 Pistol
Concurrent Task 1
sections.CONCEPT OF OPERATION:
Planning: LT Smith plan and resources backside support for the range, RSO plans the training in accordance with IWITS strategy
Preparation: On 19NOV RSO back briefs CPT Johnson the training plan during rehearsal and SL’s train the trainer (TL’s) at the range
sections.EXECUTION:
MG Teams conduct Pistol Qualification, Rifle Teams conduct Pistol Qualification then rifle qualification in the afternoon. TL’s are the primary trainers and held accountable for their teams scores
Recovery: Participants collect ammo and clean the range. Range is closed out.
sections.TASKS:

draw.overall_supervision_plan: OIC and Leadership will conduct a Range Reconnaissance to proof the range prior to the execution of the qualification. Convoy Commander will complete Convoy Ramp Brief prior to SP for the Range. OIC and RSO will orient Soldiers to the range, specifically highlighting the firing line, firing positions, range fans, ammo point, and clearing areas during the Safety Brief. Soldiers will coach/safety each other on the firing line with NCOs serving as safeties in a 1:2 ratio during the Shotgun Portion of the Range.
